title: Circle of the Moon
content: dom saving throws and is blinded. Filth Fever: A raging fever sweeps through the creature's body. The creature has disadvantage on Strength checks, Strength saving throws, and attack rolls that use Strength. Flesh Rot: The creature's flesh decays. The creature has disadvantage on Charisma checks and vulnerability to all damage. Mindfire: The creature's mind becomes feverish.
